chatgpt5.title: Image Creation – Graffiti Style Preset
chatgpt5.objective: Build a high-signal prompt for image creation → Graffiti Style. Populate all six model tabs with coherent fields.
chatgpt5.nongoals: Do not refactor app architecture; avoid external packages.
chatgpt5.role: Act as a principal producer and prompt engineer.
chatgpt5.context: This preset targets Image Creation / Graffiti Style. Use domain-appropriate terms. Keep examples minimal.
chatgpt5.musts:
- Acceptance criteria
- Risks + mitigations
- Steps
- Output format explicit
chatgpt5.constraints:
- No external packages
- Keep outputs ≤ 500 words unless specified
chatgpt5.format: Markdown with headings or JSON structure, as appropriate.
chatgpt5.success: Usable without follow-ups; testable and clear.
chatgpt5.examplesGood: Hypothesis: selector captured stale closure; fix with subscribeWithSelector + shallow compare.

soraImage.sora_img_subject: Subject aligned to graffiti style — iconic key visual or scene element.
soraImage.sora_img_setting: Contextual environment appropriate to the theme; specify time of day/era.
soraImage.sora_img_comp: Rule of thirds; shallow DOF; 50mm lens feel; centered subject if portrait.
soraImage.sora_img_pose: Natural pose; clear silhouette; hands visible if applicable.
soraImage.sora_img_lighting: Soft key + rim; golden hour if outdoors.
soraImage.sora_img_texture: Fine grain; subtle bloom; gentle film halation.
soraImage.sora_img_continuity: Maintain costume colors and prop positions across iterations.
soraImage.sora_img_include: Primary subject; environment anchor; one hero prop.
soraImage.sora_img_neg: No brand marks; no watermarks; no duplicate limbs.

soraVideo.sora_vid_subj: Central subject aligned to graffiti style
soraVideo.sora_vid_setting: Cohesive environment; time of day matches mood.
soraVideo.sora_vid_comp: Medium shot; slight low angle; shallow DOF.
soraVideo.sora_vid_texture: Subtle grain; light motion blur; no aggressive VFX.
soraVideo.sora_vid_include: Hero subject; clear environment cue; resolving action.
soraVideo.sora_vid_neg: No shaky cam; no abrupt cuts (unless allowed).

gemini.gem_role: Act as an expert for Image Creation / Graffiti Style.
gemini.gem_inst: Produce a focused prompt or outline for graffiti style tasks.
gemini.gem_ctx: Constraints: no external packages; ≤ 500 words. Target user: Creative Director.
gemini.gem_fx: Return a bullet list with labeled sections and clear action items.
gemini.gem_safe: Avoid PII; respect IP; no unsafe instructions.

bananaNano.bn_persona: You are a seasoned creative director for Graffiti Style.
bananaNano.bn_goal: Draft a compact, ready-to-run task brief for graffiti style.
bananaNano.bn_ctx: Use user-friendly language; aim for speedy execution in Graffiti Style.
bananaNano.bn_schema: Plain text with 4 sections: Goal, Inputs, Steps, Checks.
bananaNano.bn_examples_pos: One-liner example that demonstrates the output shape.

veo3.veo_directive: Generate a short graffiti style-styled clip with a simple narrative arc.
veo3.veo_subj: Define the hero subject with wardrobe and one prop.
veo3.veo_env: One location with strong production design cue.
veo3.veo_cam: Opening: push-in; Main: tracking; Close: static hold.
veo3.veo_action: Beat 1 setup; Beat 2 action; Beat 3 resolve with clear ending moment.
veo3.veo_audio: Ambient bed plus light SFX; no dialogue.
veo3.veo_params: Avoid sudden cuts; keep motion smooth; brand-safe.
